string-array.name: movie_words
string-array.item: "堅強而勇敢，仁慈且善良。 Have courage and be kind."
"有時候，我們需要奇跡。 Sometimes we need a little magic."
"希望是一個好東西，也許是最好的，好東西不會消亡。 Hope is a good thing and maybe the best of things. And no good thing ever dies."
"汲汲而生，汲汲而死。 Get busy living or get busy dying."
"堅強的人只能救贖自己，偉大的人才能拯救他人。 It takes a strong man to save himself, and a great man to save another."
"如果你有夢想，就要守護它。 You got a dream, you gotta protect it."
"當人們做不到一些事情的時候，他們就會對你說你也同樣不能。 People can't do something themselves, they wanna tell you can't do it."
"幸福裏面沒有為什麽，只有我。 There is an I in \"happiness\", there is no Y in \"happiness\", it's an I."
"我認為紙上談兵沒什麽作用。 I think it's hard winning a war with words."
"先生，你可真不是個君子，小姐，你也不是什麽淑女。 Sir, you're no gentleman. And you miss are no lady."
"明天又是全新的一天。 Tomorrow is another day."
"你跳，我跟你跳。 You jump, I jump."
"我們真他媽的走運極了。 We're the luckiest sons-of-bitches in the world."
"生活本來就全靠運氣。 All life is a game of luck."
"要讓每一天都有所值。 To make each day count."
"命中註定。 Destiny takes a hand."
"你是我的命運。 You are my destiny."
"吃還是不吃，是需要考慮的問題。 To eat or not to eat, that's a question."
"如果這個世界對你不理不睬，你也可以這樣對待它。 When the world turns its back on you. You turn your back on the world."
"你，你的氣味，對我來說就像海洛因一樣無法抗拒。 It's you, your scent, it's like a drug to me. You're like my personal brand of heroin."
"只有你才能讓我如此上癮。 Only for making me want you so badly."
"我不顧一切地愛上了他。 I was unconditionally and irrevocably in love with him."
"我第一次遇見你的時候你就劫數難逃。 Your number was up the first time I met you."
"過去的事是不可以改變的。 You can't change the past."
"生命就像一盒巧克力，結果往往出人意料。 Life was like a box of chocolates, you never know what you're gonna get."
"奇蹟每天都在發生。 Miracles happen every day."
"鈔票不是萬能的，有時還需要信用卡。 Money is not everything. There's MasterCard."
"愛情就像照片，需要大量的暗房時間來培養。 Love is photogenic. It needs darkness to develop."
"要被歸為“聰明人”我得去掉60點智商才行。 I'd have to lose 60 IQ points to be classified as \"smart\"."
"從我媽給我斷奶後我就沒忘掉過一件事。 I haven't forgotten a single thing since the day my mother stopped breastfeeding me."
"有些東西失去了才懂得珍惜。 You don't know good things till they are gone."
"陽光穿過窗。 Sunlight creeps in between the curtains."
"被人遺忘，也是被人記起的方法。 Way to be forgotten. But that's how you get remembered."
"我愛你，一直是，永遠會。 I love you, always have, always will."
"如果真相傷人，那保守秘密就沒什麼不對。 There's nothing wrong to keep this secret if its truth will hurt someone."
"終有一天，你會學會淚往心裡流。 Look, eventually, you'll learn to do that on the inside."
"我雖然不是什麼好人，但絕對不是縮頭烏龜。 I'm a lot of things, but I'm not a quitter."
"我們只要散發正能量，宇宙會證明給我們看的。 Let's just send out positive energy, and the universe will provide."
"面對現實吧，我們要靠自己。 Might as well face it. You and I are on our own."
"這傢伙還有台新蘋果，而我卻一周都在吃同一個蘋果。 This guy has a brand-new apple. I've been eating the same apple for a week."
"今天是我們的基念日啊！ It's our man-iversary."
"我都窮到拿肥皂盒當錢包了。 I use the box that our soap comes in as a wallet."
"世上並沒有絕對的善與惡，差別只在於強者和無法分清事實的弱者。 There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it."
"你最恐懼的其實是恐懼本身。 That suggests that what you fear most of all… is fear itself."
"決定我們成為什麼樣人的，不是我們的能力，而是我們的選擇。 It is not our abilities that show what we truly are, it is our choices."
"對不起，教授，我不可以說謊。 I'm sorry, professor, but I must not tell lies."
"巨大財富的背後，都隱藏著罪惡。 Behind every great fortune, there is a crime."
"一個人只有一個命運。 Every man has one destiny."
"你做出了這個決定，這是你的代價。 You make the choice, and this is your price."
"永遠不要讓別人知道你的真實想法。 Don't let anybody know what you are thinking."
"生活是如此的美麗。 Life is so beautiful."
"那麼，去愛一些其他人吧。 So, love somebody else."
"這個世界本身就沒有所謂的清白而言。你敢說，你從來就沒說過慌？這是自欺欺人。 Only don't tell me you're innocent. It insults my intelligence, makes me very angry."
"偉大的人不是生下來就偉大的，而是在成長過程中顯示其偉大的。 Great people are not born with the great, but in the process of growing up show its great."
"不顧家的男人不是真正的男人。 A man who is not a father will never be a real man."
"不要說不可能，沒有什麼不可能。 Do not say impossible, nothing is impossible."
"該發生的事總會發生。 Whatever can happen, will happen."
"從1到10，你的疼痛指數有多少？ On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain?"
"乖啊。乖。 There. There."
"成功是一個相關名詞，他會給你帶來很多不相關的親戚。 Success is a relative term. It brings so many relatives."
"上天決定了你的出身，幸運的是在選擇朋友方面給你留了余地。 God made relatives.Thank God we can choose our friends."
"聰明人都是未婚的，結婚的人很難再聰明起來。 The wise never marry. And when they marry they become otherwise."
"現在的夢想決定著你的將來，所以還是再睡一會吧。 Your future depends on your dreams. So go to sleep."
"應該有更好的方式開始新一天，而不是千篇一律的在每個上午醒來。 There should be a better way to start a day than waking up every morning."
"努力工作不會導致死亡！不過乾嘛要冒這個險。 Hard work never kills anybody. But why take the risk?"
"工作好有意思耶！尤其是看著別人工作。 Work fascinates me. I can look at it for hours!"
